title: Champion who becomes turrets
body:
So we have a champion who summons turrets, but when are we finally going to get a champion that becomes the turret?

Ya'll are making champs that steal everything else, so wheres our turret champion

replies.body: lol, turrets are not that fast except TT nexus turrets maybe
No, but even the pros weren't orb walking at that speed. They'd plant their feet and click targets till someone died, them or enemy.

there's a hero in hots that becomes a turret and league doesn't need that
it's really unpleasant
It’s like splitpushing combined with funneling... and without mounts that would be so broken in LoL.

Urgot is basically a turret with his maxed W

A turret champion would feel really out of place in league though. Every champion has some crazy niech like jinx is  a crazy gunslinger and riven is a self imposed exile.

A turret champion just sounds really plain to me.
